title: Organizational Customer
description:
A CUSTOMER is any person, legal entity or authority with which Boehringer Ingelheim is doing business, that ...

•	receives goods or services from Boehringer Ingelheim, or
•	pays BI for goods or services according to agreed terms and conditions or applicable laws, or
•	interacts with BI as part of any selling or information gathering or distributing activity such as quotations, offers, rebates, ...
